name: Patient Zero (MarcoR)
description:
This game was made for the 2020 LIVE Lab Covid Game Jam. It is my latest solo-developer project and I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it.

You play as patient zero for a new disease. Your goal is to spread the disease as much as possible until the entire population is infected! 

Latest version includes some bug fixes with NPC-AI. Game is now beatable! However this change was done shortly after the Game Jam submission deadline.
